title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not listed. To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. The new data source should have no database/table/column information. Actual result: The children nodes are not listed when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. To resolve this issue, close the data set editor and reopen it.
EB: The children nodes should be listed when changing the data source.
